title: Bootstrap repo structure and core docs
body: Create initial repo structure: /docs, /data, /app, /scripts, /infra, /examples. Add placeholder README with project overview and personas.

title: Add CONTRIBUTING, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, and LICENSE
body: Add open-source friendly contribution docs, including expectations for data provenance and licensing.

title: Define Kwanzaa brand constants and Nguzo Saba mapping
body: Encode brand constants (name origin, tagline) and map Nguzo Saba principles to explicit product requirements.

title: Define persona presets (builder, educator, creator, researcher)
body: Create config-driven persona presets with defaults for citations_required, primary_sources_only, and creative_mode.

title: Define answer_json response contract
body: Define strict JSON schema for AI responses: Answer, Sources, RetrievalSummary, Unknowns. Must be renderable by AIKit.

title: Create ZeroDB table: kw_sources
body: Table for source manifest registry with license, canonical_url, source_type, and access_method.

title: Create ZeroDB table: kw_documents
body: Document-level records including source_org, canonical_url, license, year, content_type.

title: Create ZeroDB table: kw_chunks
body: Chunk-level records with embeddings, provenance metadata, chunk_index, retrieved_at.

title: Create ZeroDB table: kw_ingestion_runs
body: Track ingestion jobs: run_id, source_name, counts, errors, timestamps.

title: Define FirstFruitsManifest format
body: Define manifest schema: source_name, source_type, access_method, license, canonical_url, priority, tags.

title: Create initial P0 First Fruits manifest
body: Add 10–25 high-signal, public-domain or permissively licensed sources focused on primary Black history materials.

title: Implement metadata-first ingestion pipeline
body: Ingest metadata + short snippets first into ZeroDB to enable fast search and provenance UI.

title: Implement selective full-text expansion for P0 sources
body: Expand only P0 sources to full text, then chunk, embed, and store.

title: Finalize namespace strategy
body: Create and document namespaces: kwanzaa_primary_sources, kwanzaa_black_press, kwanzaa_speeches_letters, kwanzaa_black_stem, kwanzaa_teaching_kits, kwanzaa_dev_patterns.

title: Implement semantic search with provenance filters
body: Enable search with filters for year, source_org, content_type, tags, and namespace.

title: Build Kwanzaa Chat UI (AIKit)
body: Chat UI with persona presets, mode toggles, and answer_json rendering.

title: Implement RAG orchestration with citation enforcement
body: Retrieve → inject context → generate. If citations_required and none retrieved, must refuse.

title: Implement 'Show Your Work' retrieval panel
body: Display top retrieved chunks with scores, metadata, and canonical URLs.

title: Define base model selection criteria (AI2-first)
body: Document criteria: license, instruction-following, context length, JSON compliance, hosting cost.

title: Prepare training dataset (citation + refusal + JSON)
body: Create ≥120 training examples and 25–40 eval examples. Validate JSONL format.

title: Run QLoRA adapter training (HF AutoTrain)
body: Train adapter focused on citation-following, refusal, and strict answer_json output.

title: Evaluate adapter (citation coverage + refusal correctness)
body: Run eval harness and record metrics. Decide if second run needed.

title: Publish adapter artifact and dataset manifest
body: Publish adapter weights, training config, dataset manifest, and reproducibility notes.

title: Create demo scripts for all four personas
body: Write demo walkthroughs with 10 demo-ready questions per persona.
